intro.title: Official Stadium Management Platform
intro.description: This platform is the official digital solution developed and managed by the Tan-Tan Municipality to facilitate stadium reservations for local sports clubs, teams, and community events.
intro.mission: Our mission is to streamline stadium access, promote sports development, and support athletic excellence in our community.

municipality.title: About Tan-Tan Municipality
municipality.description: As the governing body of Tan-Tan city, our municipality is committed to enhancing public services, supporting local development, and fostering community engagement through innovative digital solutions.
responsibilities: Supporting local sports clubs and events

features.title: Easy Online Booking
features.description: Simple 3-step reservation process for all stadium facilities

features.title: Club Management
features.description: Dedicated tools for sports clubs to manage their bookings

features.title: Municipal Oversight
features.description: Direct integration with Tan-Tan Municipality's scheduling systems

contactMunicipality.title: Contact the Municipality
contactMunicipality.description: For official inquiries about stadium management, facility improvements, or partnership opportunities with Tan-Tan Municipality.
contactMunicipality.officeHours: Municipal Office Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
contactMunicipality.emergencyContact: Emergency Stadium Issues: Contact Municipal Sports Department

partnerships.title: Partnership Opportunities
partnerships.description: Tan-Tan Municipality welcomes partnerships with sports organizations, event organizers, and community groups to enhance stadium utilization and sports development.

callToAction.title: Ready to Book Your Stadium Experience?
callToAction.description: Join hundreds of sports clubs and teams already using our official municipal platform for their stadium needs.

questions.question: How long does it take to get a response?
questions.answer: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.

questions.question: Can I book a stadium directly through email?
questions.answer: For official stadium bookings, please use our online booking system for faster processing.

questions.question: Do you offer emergency stadium support?
questions.answer: Yes, for urgent stadium issues, please call our emergency line mentioned above.

questions.question: Can I visit the municipal office directly?
questions.answer: Yes, our office is open Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM.

emergency.title: Emergency Stadium Issues
emergency.description: For urgent stadium problems that need immediate attention
emergency.contact: Call Municipal Sports Department: +212 5XX XX XX XX

Contact.outsideHours: Outside business hours? Leave a message and we'll respond on the next business day.

security.title: Secure Communication
security.description: Your information is protected with industry-standard encryption. We never share your data with third parties.
